text: Jan Shutan Levinson (born Janice Dottenheim; November 5, 1932 â€“ October 7, 2021) was an American actress. She was best known for her roles in Star Trek: The Original Series, Sons and Daughters and The Andy Griffith Show. Levinson died on October 7, 2021, in Beverly Hills, California at the age of 88.Jan Shutan Levinson ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
